allow: Bash(DEBUG=app-store-scraper:screenshot-fallback node -e "const store = require(''./index''); store.app({id: ''6448311069'', country: ''us''}).then(app => console.log(''ChatGPT Screenshots:'', app.screenshots.length, ''iPhone,'', app.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad'')).catch(console.error)")

Bash(DEBUG=app-store-scraper:screenshot-fallback node -e "const store = require(''./index''); store.app({id: ''6448311069'', country: ''us''}).then(app => { console.log(''Raw iTunes API data structure:''); console.log(''app.screenshots:'', app.screenshots ? app.screenshots.length : ''undefined/null''); console.log(''app.ipadScreenshots:'', app.ipadScreenshots ? app.ipadScreenshots.length : ''undefined/null''); console.log(''app.appletvScreenshots:'', app.appletvScreenshots ? app.appletvScreenshots.length : ''undefined/null''); console.log(''Checking detection logic:''); console.log(''hasIphoneScreenshots ='', !!(app.screenshots && app.screenshots.length > 0)); console.log(''hasIpadScreenshots ='', !!(app.ipadScreenshots && app.ipadScreenshots.length > 0)); }).catch(console.error)")

Bash(DEBUG=app-store-scraper:screenshot-fallback node -e "const store = require(''./index''); store.app({id: ''6448311069'', country: ''us''}).then(app => { console.log(''ChatGPT Results:''); console.log(''iPhone screenshots:'', app.screenshots.length); console.log(''iPad screenshots:'', app.ipadScreenshots.length); console.log(''First iPhone screenshot:'', app.screenshots[0]); }).catch(console.error)")

Bash(DEBUG=app-store-scraper:screenshot-fallback node -e "const store = require(''./index''); store.app({id: ''6446901002'', country: ''us''}).then(app => { console.log(''Threads Results:''); console.log(''iPhone screenshots:'', app.screenshots.length); console.log(''iPad screenshots:'', app.ipadScreenshots.length); if (app.screenshots.length > 0) { console.log(''First iPhone screenshot:'', app.screenshots[0]); } if (app.ipadScreenshots.length > 0) { console.log(''First iPad screenshot:'', app.ipadScreenshots[0]); } }).catch(console.error)")

Bash(DEBUG=app-store-scraper:screenshot-fallback node -e "const store = require(''./lib/app''); store({id: ''6446901002'', country: ''us''}).then(app => { console.log(''THREADS - New Universal Rules:''); console.log(''iPhone screenshots:'', app.screenshots.length); console.log(''iPad screenshots:'', app.ipadScreenshots.length); if (app.screenshots.length > 0) { console.log(''First iPhone:'', app.screenshots[0].split(''/'').slice(-2).join(''/'')); } if (app.ipadScreenshots.length > 0) { console.log(''First iPad:'', app.ipadScreenshots[0].split(''/'').slice(-2).join(''/'')); } }).catch(console.error)")

Bash(DEBUG=app-store-scraper:screenshot-fallback node -e "const store = require(''./lib/app''); store({id: ''6448311069'', country: ''us''}).then(app => { console.log(''CHATGPT - New Universal Rules:''); console.log(''iPhone screenshots:'', app.screenshots.length); console.log(''iPad screenshots:'', app.ipadScreenshots.length); if (app.screenshots.length > 0) { console.log(''First iPhone:'', app.screenshots[0].split(''/'').slice(-2).join(''/'')); } if (app.ipadScreenshots.length > 0) { console.log(''First iPad:'', app.ipadScreenshots[0].split(''/'').slice(-2).join(''/'')); } }).catch(console.error)")

Bash(DEBUG=app-store-scraper:screenshot-fallback node -e "const store = require(''./lib/app''); Promise.all([store({id: ''6446901002'', country: ''us''}), store({id: ''6448311069'', country: ''us''})]).then(([threads, chatgpt]) => { console.log(''IMPROVED RESULTS:''); console.log(''Threads:'', threads.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', threads.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); console.log(''ChatGPT:'', chatgpt.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', chatgpt.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); }).catch(console.error)")

Bash(DEBUG=app-store-scraper:screenshot-fallback node -e "const store = require(''./lib/app''); store({id: ''6446901002'', country: ''us''}).then(app => { console.log(''THREADS - iPhone Screenshots:''); app.screenshots.forEach((url, i) => console.log(i + 1, url.split(''/'').slice(-3).join(''/''))); }).catch(console.error)")

Bash(DEBUG=app-store-scraper:screenshot-fallback node -e "const store = require(''./lib/app''); Promise.all([store({id: ''6446901002'', country: ''us''}), store({id: ''6448311069'', country: ''us''}), store({id: ''389801252'', country: ''us''}), store({id: ''284882215'', country: ''us''})]).then(([threads, chatgpt, instagram, facebook]) => { console.log(''FINAL TEST RESULTS:''); console.log(''Threads:'', threads.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', threads.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); console.log(''ChatGPT:'', chatgpt.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', chatgpt.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); console.log(''Instagram:'', instagram.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', instagram.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); console.log(''Facebook:'', facebook.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', facebook.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); }).catch(console.error)")

Bash(DEBUG=app-store-scraper:screenshot-fallback node -e "const store = require(''./lib/app''); Promise.all([store({id: ''6446901002'', country: ''us''}), store({id: ''389801252'', country: ''us''}), store({appId: ''com.nbaimd.gametime.universal'', country: ''us''})]).then(([threads, instagram, nba]) => { console.log(''CONTAMINATION PROTECTION TEST:''); console.log(''Threads:'', threads.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', threads.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); console.log(''Instagram:'', instagram.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', instagram.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); console.log(''NBA:'', nba.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', nba.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); }).catch(console.error)")

Bash(DEBUG=app-store-scraper:screenshot-fallback node -e "const store = require(''./lib/app''); Promise.all([store({id: ''6446901002'', country: ''us''}), store({id: ''6448311069'', country: ''us''}), store({id: ''310633997'', country: ''us''}), store({id: ''389801252'', country: ''us''}), store({id: ''284882215'', country: ''us''}), store({appId: ''com.nbaimd.gametime.universal'', country: ''us''})]).then(([threads, chatgpt, whatsapp, instagram, facebook, nba]) => { console.log(''🎉 FINAL COMPREHENSIVE TEST RESULTS:''); console.log(''Threads:'', threads.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', threads.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); console.log(''ChatGPT:'', chatgpt.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', chatgpt.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); console.log(''WhatsApp:'', whatsapp.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', whatsapp.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); console.log(''Instagram:'', instagram.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', instagram.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); console.log(''Facebook:'', facebook.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', facebook.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); console.log(''NBA:'', nba.screenshots.length, ''iPhone +'', nba.ipadScreenshots.length, ''iPad''); }).catch(console.error)")
